properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
M/V O MAESTRO, FIVE PERSONS ON BOARD, UNREPORTED.
LAST KNOWN POSITION IN VICINITY 22-17.59S 041-21.25W
AT 31 JAN. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
ANY COASTAL RADIO STATION.
